    • Uses of BuyableSquare in mono.model.entities

      Subclasses of BuyableSquare in mono.model.entities 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Companies
      Creates a company square (Eletricity and Water) and calculates rent according to the number of companies owned and dice values.
      class  Property
      Creates property square, calculates rent and builds houses and hotels.
      class  Station
      Creates station square and calculates rent according to station owned.
